markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Alkenstar Ice Wine](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1788)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Drug" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=261" />
<trait label="Ingested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
<trait label="Positive" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=128" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 106</row>

**Price** 25 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

**Access** Characters from Alkenstar have access to this item.

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This bottle of delicately sweet ice wine has the properties of [alcohol](/Equipment.aspx?ID=622). Made exclusively from grapes frozen in the Mana Wastes' erratic surge storms, Alkenstar ice wine finds a ready market among Geb, though [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) are still immune to the drug's listed effects.

 The listed price is for a mediocre vintage, but finer vintages are higher level and commensurately more expensive.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
